title: 08/24: Breakouts; Mid-Round Strategies; Fantasy Jeopardy! (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
We'll give you six breakouts at the top of the show including three intriguing WRs Chris Hogan, Corey Davis and Marquise Goodwin. Who is our favorite of these three? And you won't believe the crazy take that Heath gave on Twitter (11:08)! ... Reacting to CLE-PHI (17:35) and wondering about both offenses. Are we getting worried about the Eagles? Should Carlos Hyde continue to climb the draft boards? We get into the big NFL news (25:30) regarding Marlon Mack and much more before discussing Mark Ingram's potential after returning from suspension (31:40) ... Rankings disputes (36:36) on Saquon Barkley, Drew Brees and Evan Engram, then it's time for another dysfunctional round of Fantasy Jeopardy (52:50)! ... Your emails at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
